casebody.data:
ATIAPO
v.
GOREE LOGISTICS, INC., et al. No. 139P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. John F. Scarborough, for Owen Thomas, Inc. Lawrence P. Margolis, Charlotte, for Goree Logistics, Inc., et al. Kenneth C. Martin, Charlotte, for Atiapo, Frances. Marc X. Sneed, Assistant Attorney General. John F. Scarbrough, Charlotte, for Owen Thomas, Inc. Sidney S. Eagles, Jr., Raleigh, for American Trucking Association, Inc. and North Carolina Trucking Association.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the conditional motion filed on the 21st of April 2015 by American Trucking Association, Inc. and North Carolina Trucking Association for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
